title: Border, 1750–99
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist, then indigo dyed on plain weave (the fabric was woven with every third weft twice the thickness of the other weft so that the fabric has a ribbed surface)
dimensions: Warp: 126 cm (49.6 in.). Weft: (selvage  on one side) 16 cm (6 1/2 in. ).
description: Border design of swags with tassels between them. In white on blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1750–99.
1750–99. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist, then indigo dyed on plain weave (the fabric was woven with every third weft twice the thickness of the other weft so that the fabric has a ribbed surface). Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-307.
